na.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 60 weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: 45 weight: @ 1 2
          # len: 3 ang: 30 weight: @ 2 1

dian.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 30 weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: 45 weight: @ 1 2
          # len: 3 ang: 60 weight: @ 2 1

zuodian.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 135
          # len: 3 ang: 120
          # len: 3 ang: 105

ti.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 0
          # len: 3 ang: -10
          # len: 3 ang: -10

wan.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 1 ang: 30
          # len: 3 ang: 70
          # len: 5 ang: 105

shupie.text:
# type: Stroke
  body: @ shu pie

  prog: @ # ith: 0
          # ith: 1 rotate: -30
                   curl: 9

-xieshuwan2.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 7 ang: 140
          # len: 1 ang: 70
          # len: 5 ang: 0
          # len: 0.3 ang: 0
          # len: 0.3 ang: -10
          # len: 0.3 ang: -10

-zhe-down.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 93
          # len: 3 ang: 93
          # len: 3 ang: 93

-gou-down.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 1 ang: 153
          # len: 1 ang: 153
          # len: 1 ang: 153

-gou-left.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 1 ang: -120
          # len: 1 ang: -135
          # len: 1 ang: -135

-gou-up.text:
# type: Curve
  body: @ # len: 1 ang: -103
          # len: 1 ang: -102
          # len: 1 ang: -101

henggou.text:
# type: Stroke
  body: @ heng -gou-down
  prog: @ # ith: 1

hengzhegou.text:
# type: Stroke
  body: @ hengzhe- -gou-left
  prog: @ # ith: 1 curl: -3

hengzhezhe.text:
# type: Stroke
  body: @ heng shu heng

hengzhezhepie.text:
# type: Stroke
  body: @ hengzhe- heng pie
  prog: @ # ith: 1 scale: 0.6 rotate: 10
          # ith: 2 scale: 0.5

hengzhezhezhegou.text:
# type: Stroke
  body: @ hengzhe- heng pie -gou-left
  prog: @ # ith: 1 scale: 0.5 rotate: 10
          # ith: 2 scale: 0.5
          # ith: 3 rotate: -15

wogou.text:
# type: Stroke
  body: @ xiegou
  prog: @ # ith: 0 rotate: -10 curl: -20 scale: 1.2
